name: Instagram / Full Width & Bigger Photos
description: What if Instagram.com was exactly the same as the Instagram.app? This style will make your photos bigger by removing the space between them, just like the app. The container was also modified so it always takes 100% of your screen width.
additional_info:
Changelog

* 10 Feb 2018 Tweaks to remove extra margins * 20 Nov 2017 Updates to reflect changes introduced by Instagram on Aug 2017 * 29 Mar 2016 First release ? Check out the repository on GitHub: http://github.com/edmundojr/userstyles
